Description: Head bead. Of cylindrical form representing a black African in opaque black glass in the body of which are scattered red threads. The curly hair is represented by small glass discs. The heavy lips are in yellow glass. The large eyes are opaque white with the pupils of black glass in high relief. The suspension loop is lost. Brown core.
Bibliographic references: Glass / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass in the British Museum (419)
Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.46)
